name: Zombie Apocalypse (itch) (JawaanGS)
description:
Save the City from Zombies Apocalypse make sure to kill them and don't get yourself killed...Use your ability so that you are no longer in the sight of the zombies.....Enjoy!!

Simple Controls

W,A,S,D for Movement

E to use Ability

Right Mouse Button to Shoot and throw Grenades

Minimal mouse button scroll for switching between weapons

And also don't forget to give a review....I would love to hear what you guys think about this.....Thank You
